title: Imaduwa PS Chairman dead following clash
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Chairman of the Imaduwa Pradeshiya Sabha A. V. Sarath Kumara was reported dead upon hospitalization following an attack on his residence.
Police said that the 63-year-old Chairman was also assaulted by a group of on Monday (9) night.
Police said the post-mortem revealed that he had suffered a heart attack.
(VIDEO) Here’s a list of SLPP politico property attacked during Monday’s (9) violence;
